Afghanistan: Nader invaded and destroyed Kandahar, and restored the Abdali ethnic Pashtus to political prominence.
Belgium: Henri-Joseph Rega establishes Leuven's botanical garden.
France: Treaty of Vienna: The signing of the treaty ended the War of the Polish Succession. France gained the Duchy of Lorraine and Bar.
Poland: Treaty of Vienna concludes the War of the Polish Succession
Taiwan: Reclamation of aboriginal land is banned
